transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haanji sir.
Executive: Ashfaq se Sanjeev baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir aapka wo current account wala kaam abhi tak nahi hua kya?
Customer: Wo Salman ne baat nahi ki kya aapse?
Executive: Sir Salman sir calling nahi uthate hain.
Customer: Salman sir calling nahi utha rahe hain mera ye paisa refund ho jayega sir mere yahan se download ho chuka hai case already.
Executive: Refund mein movement ho raha hai process aapka refund.
Customer: Wo account mein main usko kal pucha tha wo bola hai submit kiya aaj ya kal mein process ho jayega.
Executive: Sir wo mere ko pichle 15-20 din se pehle yahi bol rahe hain ki sir aaj kal mein ho jayega aaj kal mein ho jayega mujhe samajh nahi aaya wo kara payenge ya nahi sir dekhiye refund ho raha hai case aapka.
Customer: Meri baat meri.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Main usko kal baat kiya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Other se aur usse.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To unke father ne bola ki maine wo jo document hai wo sab submit karwa diye aaj kal naya niyam lagu ho gaya na wo jo karkhane pe aana padta hai bank wale.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To wo wo bank wala bola main aake dekh ke jaunga.
Executive: Fir uske baad wo process karenge.
Customer: To sir fir main aaj kitne baje tak ho jayega aapka kaam ye bataiye aap mujhe agar aaj ho jata hai to.
Executive: Aaj to aaj to dekho aaj aayega wo bank wala.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To uske baad me dekho kab bole process chalu kare wo.
Customer: Abhi matlab.
Executive: Bank mein jama karwa diye.
Customer: Achcha matlab document wagera sab kuch aapne de diya hai?
Executive: Haan submit ho gaye.
Customer: Okay to aapko matlab ke kis date ko aaj sham tak ho jayega?
Executive: Haan jo bhi hai wo temporary account number aayega main tumko de dunga wo.
Customer: Sir dekhiye thoda sa isko jaldi karaiye because aapka paisa na refund aa gaya aapke paas mail bhi ja chuka hoga shayad.
Executive: Mail to mere ko nahi aayega na usko hi aayega mere ko idea hi nahi.
Customer: Okay okay sir ye refund ke liye move ho raha hai case aap isse kara dijiye thoda sa to jisse ki main refund na karwa ke aapke paas paise live kara du aapka jaldi se jaldi aur aapko proper certification wagera main ispe kar du to aap mujhe thoda sa vishwas kara dijiye sir please.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Thoda sa jaldi kara dijiye sir ye current account wala kaam.
Executive: Haan bilkul.
Executive: To sir main kal tak ka time aur le lu?
Executive: Ek din ka time lo.
Customer: Ek din ka time.
Executive: Aaj to dekho kya bolta hai aaj wo process ho jayega fir dekhte hain main kya hoga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Bank process aaj aayega wo aaj check karne aayega karkhane pe aayega.
Customer: Kitne baje tak?
Executive: Kya to main to bahar hu mere ko malum aayega hi nahi hai na.
Customer: To aap Salman ji ko boliye mera call utha le because wo mera call hi nahi utha rahe hain.
Executive: Haan to main usko bol dunga call uthane ke liye.
Customer: Hmm. Theek hai.
Executive: Main usko bol dunga.
Customer: Will update the same sir theek hai okay thank you sir.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Okay welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Current account work not yet completed.

- Wants refund to be processed quickly.

- Salman is not answering the calls.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive will inform Salman to answer the call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will take one more day to resolve.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, current account, calling, process
